description: A video shows apartment complex residents in North Carolina trying to pull two wild black bear cubs from a tree to pose with them. One person manages to grab a cub before it runs away.
title: A video shows people trying to pull 2 black bear cubs from trees in North Carolina

description: A naval chief petty officer who served on a Japan-based destroyer was found guilty of sharing classified information with a foreign government, the Navy's investigative agency said.
title: Military court convicts U.S. sailor of attempted espionage

description: The package now heads to the Senate, where it is also expected to pass.
title: House passes foreign aid bills to Israel, Ukraine and Taiwan

description: The bill represents the most serious threat yet to the video app used by half of Americans.
title: House approves sell-or-be-banned TikTok measure, attaching it to foreign aid bill

description: San Francisco is the latest U.S. city preparing to receive a pair of pandas from China, in a continuation of Beijing's famed "panda diplomacy."
title: The San Francisco Zoo will receive a pair of pandas from China

description: The administration said it will restrict new oil and gas leasing on 13 million acres in Alaska to help protect wildlife such as caribou and polar bears as the Arctic continues to warm.
title: Biden administration restricts oil and gas leasing in Alaska's petroleum reserve

description: Ukrainian Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal discusses on NPR's All Things Considered how further U.S. aid would make a difference on the front lines, and the state of the war in general.
title: Ukraine's prime minister says, if passed, $60B U.S. aid package will be critical

description: The man took out pamphlets espousing conspiracy theories, tossed them around, then doused himself in an accelerant and set himself on fire outside the courthouse Friday, officials and witnesses said.
title: Man who set himself on fire outside Trump trial dies of injuries, police say

description: New York Judge Juan Merchan told jurors this week to prepare to hear opening statements on Monday.
title: What to know about Week 1 of Trump's criminal trial, with jury selection complete

description: USC announced the cancellation of a keynote speech by filmmaker Jon M. Chu just days after making the choice to keep the student valedictorian, who expressed support for Palestinians, from speaking.
title: USC cancels filmmaker's keynote amid controversy over canceled valedictorian speech

description: The singer gained stardom after finishing ninth on "American Idol" in 2006. In 2014, she won a Grammy for best contemporary Christian music album for "Overcomer," her fifth album.
title: Mandisa, Grammy-winning singer and 'American Idol' alum, has died at 47

description: Volkswagen workers in Chattanooga, Tenn., voted over three days this week on whether to join the United Auto Workers union. The vote tally is expected to take several hours.
title: Voting ends in historic Tennessee Volkswagen union election
